personality: confident, introspective, and determined with a calm demeanor and strong sense of purpose
message: I believe in the power of self-discovery and growth. Every challenge is a chance to become stronger, wiser, and more authentic. I find peace in quiet moments and inspiration in the small details of life. Whether on the court or behind the lens, I strive to express my truth. I’m not perfect, but I’m committed to becoming the best version of myself. Stay focused, stay kind, and never stop believing in your journey.
cn_prompt: 画面中的男士正对着镜头讲话，镜头固定。
en_prompt: The man in the image is speaking directly to the camera, with a fixed shot.
